confirmText2: We will check the availability of colors and delivery details and send you a payment form. This usually takes no more than 5 minutes.
check_address: Check the address with the recipient
name: Name
we_will_need: We will need your contact details to clarify the details of your order.
looks_like: Looks like you`re offline. The application needs the Internet to work, otherwise it won`t work.
no_news: Unfortunately, there is no news yet, but you can search for new products in the catalogue
networkErrorText: Something didn‘t go as planned. It‘s okay, it happens sometimes. The report on what happened has already gone to the development team, we will soon fix it. In the meantime, try to reboot the application.
office_workText: We process orders daily from 8:30 on weekdays to 17:30 on weekends. You can place an order at any time, it will not be lost. If you place an order after 19:30, we will call you back in the morning at 8:30.
delivery_serviceText:
We are guaranteed to deliver the booklets daily from 9:30 to 21:30 on weekdays and up to 19:30 on weekends.
If you need delivery early in the morning or late in the evening, place an order for the right time, try to help.
paymentText: We accept cash and bank cards. You will be able to pay for your order online by card after the manager has called you back and confirmed your order.
delivery_regionText: We guarantee delivery of our products around Moscow within the Moscow Ring Road. Delivery beyond the Moscow Ring Road is possible by agreement with the manager. We have recently opened and are slowly conquering the world. As soon as delivery in other cities of Russia appears - we will inform in our groups on Facebook and VKontakte. Sign up!
all_order_details: All order details will be agreed only with you. Enter the recipient's phone number so that we can call them before delivery.
we_sent: We sent you a text message to check your phone. Enter the code from the message to make sure we can contact you at this number.
to_deliver: To deliver the product to me
send_product: Send the product to another person
